div.div: Lake Forest College vs. Cornell College
at Mount Vernon, Iowa | Ash Park

tr.td: Cornell wins coin toss, defers to second half
Kaleb Whiting kickoff 58 yards to the LFC07, Alex Pasiewicz return 29 yards to the LFC36 (Preston Ritchie).
Charlie Quinn rush for no gain to the LFC36 (Jeffery Bollnow).
Mike Lewis pass incomplete to Mike Peters, dropped pass.
Mike Lewis pass complete to Charlie Quinn for 5 yards to the LFC41 (Jeremy Demlow).
